## DragTool class

全屏拖拽

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DragTool extends ToolBase<DragToolOptions, any>
```

**Extends:** [ToolBase](./core.toolbase)<!-- -->&lt;[DragToolOptions](./core.dragtooloptions)<!-- -->, any&gt;

## Example

```ts
const drag = new DragTool({
  handleId: '',
  targetId: ''
})

drag.enable()
drag.locate('center')
```
